title: Best Quotes of Week: Deutsche Bank Championship
headline: Best Quotes of Week: Deutsche Bank Championship
description: Rory McIlroy on why Tiger's not dominant, Michael Jordan on Ryder Cup head games, Brandel Chamblee on Sean Foley, Rickie Fowler on being sneaky-long, and Johnny Miller on why Jim Furyk might be a 'psycho' in the Top 10 Quotes.
